title: A Year in London
brief_description: Two Dutch children come to London on a year’s school exchange visit. After being met by their English hosts, a boy and girl of the same age, the fur children explore the sights of London; National Maritime Museum, Convent Garden market, Drury Lane, Fleet Street, the Strand, the Changing of the Guard at the Horse Guards, and Trafalgar Square.
